languages.text: "Есть мельта-заряд малой мощности, врывчатки хватит ровно на один проход".
"We have a low-power melta charge. Just enough explosive for a single passage."
languages.original_text: "Есть мельта-заряд малой мощности, врывчатки хватит ровно на один проход".

traits.locale_text: "We have a low-power melta charge. Just enough of the explosive for a single passage."
"We have a low-power melta charge. Just enough of the explosive for a single passage."
"We have a low-power melta charge. Just enough explosive for a single passage."
"We have a low-power melta charge. Just enough explosive for a single passage."
"We have a low-power melta charge. Just enough explosive for a single passage."
"We have a low-power melta charge. Just enough explosive for a single passage."

languages.text: "Wir haben eine Melterladung mit geringer Energie. Gerade genug Sprengstoff für eine Passage."
languages.original_text: "We have a low-power melta charge. Just enough explosive for a single passage."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben eine Melterladung mit geringer Energie. Gerade genug Sprengstoff für eine Passage."

languages.text: « Nous disposons d'une charge à fusion de faible puissance. Cet explosif suffira à ouvrir un passage. »
languages.original_text: "We have a low-power melta charge. Just enough explosive for a single passage."

traits.locale_text: « Nous disposons d'une charge à fusion de faible puissance. Cet explosif suffira à ouvrir un passage. »

languages.text: «Tenemos una carga de fusión de baja potencia, solo nos dará para despejar una vía de acceso».
languages.original_text: "We have a low-power melta charge. Just enough explosive for a single passage."

traits.locale_text: «Tenemos una carga de fusión de baja potencia, solo nos dará para despejar una vía de acceso».

languages.text: “这里有颗低功率热熔炸弹，刚好足够炸出一条通道。”
languages.original_text: "We have a low-power melta charge. Just enough explosive for a single passage."

traits.locale_text: “这里有颗低功率热熔炸弹，刚好足够炸出一条通道。”

languages.text: 「低威力のメルタ爆薬ならあります。ちょうど通路ひとつ分くらいなら開けられます」
languages.original_text: "We have a low-power melta charge. Just enough explosive for a single passage."

traits.locale_text: 「低威力のメルタ爆薬ならあります。ちょうど通路ひとつ分くらいなら開けられます」

languages.text: "Melta bombamız düşük güçte ancak yolu açmaya yeter."
languages.original_text: "We have a low-power melta charge. Just enough explosive for a single passage."

traits.locale_text: "Melta bombamız düşük güçte ancak yolu açmaya yeter."
